/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a tree-lined road, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The road, a ribbon of gray, stretches out into the distance, inviting the viewer to imagine where it might lead. On either side of the road, tall trees stand guard, their green leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the expansive view. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up at the towering trees and the road, creating a sense of scale and grandeur. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
